thread.title: Thomas Owen
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Thomas Owen

author: Thomas Owen
title: Thomas Owen
text: We have bought a few items over the years and never had a problem at all. Orders are sent out pretty quickly and are always as described. Returns and exchanges are a pleasure, no quibble just 'Customer' is always right. A very good and honest company. We have used them for some time and nod doubt will still be using them in the future. Good range of clothing at very competitive prices. Good company for peace of mind.
